009package imagingbook.common.morphology;
010
011import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
012
013/**
014 * <p>
015 * Implements a binary morphological closing operation.
016 * See Sec. 7.3.2 of [1] for additional details.
017 * </p>
018 * <p>
019 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>,
020 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
021 * </p>
022 * 
023 * @author WB
024 * @version 2022/09/18
025 */
026public class BinaryClosing extends BinaryMorphologyFilter {
027        
028        /**
029         * Constructor, creates a {@link BinaryClosing} with a 3x3 box structuring element by default.
030         */
031        public BinaryClosing() {
032                super();
033        }
034        
035        /**
036         * Constructor, creates a {@link BinaryClosing} with the specified structuring element.
037         * @param H the structuring element
038         */
039        public BinaryClosing(byte[][] H) {
040                super(H);
041        }
042
043        @Override
044        public void applyTo(ByteProcessor bp) {
045                new BinaryDilation(H).applyTo(bp);      //dilate(ip, H);
046                new BinaryErosion(H).applyTo(bp);       // erode(ip, H);
047        }
048
049}
